S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-5262: Running JUnit tests with Java 1.4.2 fails if the package private tests are on the classpath
Check that the running JVM can support Java 1.5 class files before trying to load the package private file (which are compiled with Java 1.5) when setting up the security manager for tests.
Patch file: derby-5262-1a-secmansetup_check_class_version.diff
